data.title: Harman Kardon ONYX Studio 7 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker With Super Stereo , 8 Hours Battery Life
meta_keywords: Harman Kardon ONYX Studio 7 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker With Super Stereo
data.meta_description: Harman Kardon ONYX Studio 7 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker With Super Stereo , 8 Hours Battery Life
data.text:
Elevate your senses with superior stereo and artful industrial design. Immerse yourself in the rhythm of life with unrivaled acoustic precision.

Elegantly crafted, the Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7 offers dual tweeters for beautiful stereo performance and a sleek anodized aluminum handle for easy of portability.

With 8 hours of battery life, you can move wherever the music takes you. Listen to your favorite playlist or connect two Onyx Studio 7 speakers to connect the perfect soundscape for any occasion.

The Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7 comes enhanced with two 25mm dual tweeters for true stereo sound, combined with powerful bass and a built-in Li-on rechargeable battery that provides 8 hours of playtime.

To elevate the listening experience, music enthusiasts can pair two sets of Onyx Studio 7 using the Harman Kardon wireless Dual Sound feature.

Its elegant round silhouette is crafted from premium materials featuring a sleek, die-cast anodized aluminum carrying handle for easy portability.

General Specifications

Bi-Amplification 4 X 15W

Power Adapter 19V, 2.0A

Frequency response 60Hz – 20kHz

Transmitter power less than 4dBm

Audio Specifications

Speaker Impedance 4 ohms

System Specifications

Power Consumption (Standby) 38W maximum less than 1w standby

Number of Channels 4

Power Requirement 100 – 240V AC, 50/60Hz

Maximum SPL95 db @1m

Dimensions

Sub woofer Height (mm)260 mm

Sub woofer Width (mm)161 mm

Sub woofer Depth (mm)280 mm

Woofer Specifications
